message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I understand you want a bit more, but that seems unfair to me. This offer is more balanced.
I'll compromise a bit, but I still think I deserve more
Time is running out, and we both lose if we don't agree. I'm meeting you closer to the middle here.

Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Let's be reasonable - my offer is fair and it's the best you'll get at this point.
